opensea_metadata.name: Proof_330 â€” No Egg Day During Molting Period
opensea_metadata.description:
Today, no eggs were found at MaMeeFarm.

The ducks appear healthy, active, and calm, with no signs of illness or stress.
However, a noticeable increase in feather shedding was observed, indicating that the ducks are currently in a molting phase.

Molting is a natural biological process during which egg production may temporarily stop as the ducks redirect energy toward feather renewal.
This event is considered normal and does not reflect a welfare or environmental issue.

This record documents a zero-egg day caused by natural molting, reinforcing transparency by recording both productivity and non-productivity periods as part of real farm life.

License: DGCP | MMFARM-POL-2025
